AT.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
AT.description: Das verborgene Königreich der Gummy Bears ist eine wundervolle bunte Welt voller leckerer Süßigkeiten. Seit Menschengedenken suchte König Sauerbeere nach dem magischen Gummy Bear-Medaillon, durch dessen Zauberkraft die Gummy Bears vor dem König verborgen waren. Eines Tages fand der König das Gummy Bear-Medaillon und entfernte die drei Zauberedelsteine. Nun waren die armen Gummy Bears sichtbar und die Crazy Candy-Armee konnte sie einfangen und Fallen für diejenigen aufstellen, die ihnen entkommen waren. Das Königreich der Gummy Bears wird nun von König Sauerbeere regiert. Nur DU kannst die armen Gummy Bears vor ihrem schrecklichen Schicksal bewahren. Du musst dich der Herausforderung stellen, die gestohlenen Edelsteine finden und sie mit dem Gummy Bear-Medaillon vereinigen. Nur dann kann die Magie des Medaillons die Gummy Bears wieder vor dem gemeinen König Sauerbeere und seiner Crazy Candy-Armee verbergen. Spiele in 12 zuckersüßen Welten 13 freischaltbare Errungenschaften Klassisches Abenteuerspiel mit echtem "Gummy Bear-Geschmack" Volle 3D-Umgebungen

AU.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
AU.description: The hidden Kingdom of the Gummy Bears is a tantalizing colourful world overflowing with mouth-watering sweets! For years King Sour Berry searched for a magical artefact called the Gummy Bear Medallion, which kept the Gummy Bears hidden from him. The king finally found it and removed the three mystical gems making the Gummy Bears visible. The king's Crazy Candy Army chased and captured them setting traps for those that avoided capture. The kingdom is now under the rule of King Sour Berry. You are the Gummy Bears' only hope to save them from a life of unhappiness. You must accept the quest to find the gems and return them to the Gummy Bears Medallion. Only then can the magic of the medallion hide the Gummy Bears once more from the evil King Sour Berry and his Crazy Candy Army. Play through 12 sugar coated worlds. 13 different achievements to unlock. Classic adventure platformer with a Gummy Bears twist. Full 3D environments and characters set with a 2D camera.

BG.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion

The kingdom is now under the rule of King Sour berry. You are the Gummy Bears only hope to save them from a life of unhappiness. You must accept the quest to find the gems and return them to the Gummy Bears Medallion. Only then can the magic of the medallion hide the Gummy Bears once more from the evil King Sour Berry and his Crazy Candy Army. Play through 12 sugar coated worlds. 13 different achievements to unlock. Classic adventure platformer with a Gummy Bears twist. Full 3D environments and characters set with a 2D camera.

BE.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
BE.description: Le royaume caché des Gummy Bears est un univers coloré terriblement alléchant plein de délicieux bonbons ! Depuis des années, le Roi revêche cherche un artéfact magique appelé Médaillon Gummy Bear qui rend les Gummy Bears invisibles. L’ayant trouvé, le roi en a retiré les trois gemmes mystiques pour rendre les Gummy Bears visibles. L'armée de Bonbons-dingos du roi les a capturés et a installé des pièges pour prendre ceux qui se sont échappés. Le royaume Gummy Bears est maintenant sous la coupe du Roi revêche. Tu es le seul à pouvoir sauver les Gummy Bears et leur éviter une vie de malheur. Accepte la quête, trouve les gemmes et replace-les sur le Médaillon Gummy Bears pour que sa magie fonctionne à nouveau et rende les Gummy Bears invisibles au méchant Roi revêche et à son armée de Bonbons-dingos. Joue sur 12 niveaux sucrés. 13 succès différents à débloquer. Un classique de l’aventure sur plateformes avec une touche Gummy Bears. Décors 3D intégrale et personnages en caméra 2D

ES.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
ES.description: El reino oculto de los Gummy Bears es un mundo tentador, colorido y lleno de dulces con los que se te hará la boca agua. Durante muchos años el Rey Fruta Ácida buscó un artefacto mágico llamado Medallón Gummy Bear, que mantenía a los Gummy Bears ocultos. El rey al fin lo encontró y le quitó sus 3 gemas místicas, haciendo visibles a los Gummy Bears. El Ejército de Dulces Locos del rey los persiguió y capturó, y tendió trampas para los que evitaron ser capturados. El Reino de los Gummy Bears ahora está bajo control del Rey Fruta Ácida. Tú eres el único que puede salvar a los Gummy Bears. Afronta la misión de recuperar las gemas y devolverlas al Medallón Gummy Bear. Solo entonces la magia del medallón ocultará de nuevo a los Gummy Bears del malvado Rey Fruta Ácida y su Ejército de Dulces Locos. Juega en 12 mundos bien azucarados. 13 logros diferentes que desbloquear. Una aventura clásica de plataformas con un toque Gummy Bear. Entornos totalmente 3D y personajes en cámara 2D.

IT.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
IT.description: Il regno nascosto di Gummy Bears è una stuzzicante mondo colorato pieno di dolci deliziosi! Per anni , il Re irascibile cerca un artefatto magico chiamato Medallion Gummy Bear Gummy Bears rende invisibile . Avendo trovato il re rimosso le tre gemme mistiche di fare Gummy Bears visibili. L'esercito del re Candy - dingo li catturò e impostare trappole per catturare coloro che sono fuggiti . Il regno Gummy Bears è ora sotto il controllo del re scontroso. Tu sei l' unico che può salvare i Gummy Bears ed evitare una vita di infelicità . Accettare la quest , trovare gemme e sostituirli sul medaglione Gummy Bears a lavorare di nuovo la sua magia e rendere i Gummy Bears invisibile re malvagio e il suo esercito burbero Candy- dingo . Gioca 12 livelli di dolce . 13 differenti successo sbloccabili . Un'avventura piattaforma classico con bottone Gummy Bears. Completa sfondi 3D e personaggi fotocamera 2D .

NL.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
NL.description: IHet verborgen koningrijk van de Gummie Beren is een zeer kleurijke wereld met alle mogelijke snoep soorten. Sinds jaren droomt de stoute koning van een magische Medaille met 3 tover stenen die er voor zorgt dat de Gummie Beren niet kunnen gezien worden. Uiteindelijk gevonden haalde de stoute koning de drie tover stenen weg en alle Gummie Beren warden zichtbaar zodat zijn zot snoep leger alle Gummie Beren kon vangen en overal vallen zetten om de overblijvende Gummie Beren te vangen. Het vrolijke en ooit rustige koningrijk is nu in handen van de Zure Snoep Koning. Jij ben de Gummie Beren hun enige hoop om hun te redden Aanvaard de missie en vind de 3 tover stenen en bring ze terug naar de Gummie Beren Medaille zodat de magie terug kan opereren en de Gummie Beren los kunnen van de stoute koning en zijn leger. Speel door 12 suiker werelden Voltooi 13 missies Een klassieke platform avontuur met Gummie Beer uitrusting Volledige 3D wereld

NZ.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
NZ.description: The hidden Kingdom of the Gummy Bears is a tantalizing colourful world overflowing with mouth-watering sweets! For years King Sour Berry searched for a magical artefact called the Gummy Bear Medallion, which kept the Gummy Bears hidden from him. PL.description: The hidden Kingdom of the Gummy Bears is a tantalizing colourful world overflowing with mouth-watering sweets! PT.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
PT.description: O reino oculto dos Gummy Bears é um mundo colorido fascinante e repleto de doces deliciosos! Por muitos anos o Rei Sour Berry buscou um artefato mágico chamado Medalhão do Gummy Bear, que mantém os Gummy Bears ocultos. O rei finalmente o encontrou e removeu as três pedras preciosas místicas, tornando os Gummy Bears visíveis. O Exército Crazy Candy os capturou e usou armadilhas para pegar os que escaparam. O reino dos Gummy Bears está agora nas mãos do Rei Sour Berry. Você é a única esperança dos Gummy Bears de salvá-los de uma vida infeliz. Você deve aceitar a tarefa de encontrar as pedras preciosas e devolvê-las ao Medalhão dos Gummy Bears. Só então é que a mágica do medalhão vai voltar a ocultar os Gummy Bears do malvado Rei Sour Berry e seu Exército Crazy Candy. Jogue em 12 mundos recobertos de açúcar. 13 conquistas diferentes para desbloquear. Jogo de plataforma de aventura no estilo dos Gummy Bears. Ambientes totalmente em 3D e personagens criados com uma câmera 2D.

RU.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
RU.description: Скрытые царства Gummie Медведи очень цветные мире со всеми видами конфет. В течение многих лет непослушным царем мечты о волшебном Медаль с трех магических камней, что вызывает Gummie Медведи не могут быть видны. В конце концов нашли непослушные царь взял три камня от магии, и все значения Gummie Медведи видны настолько сумасшедшим конфеты армии все Gummie медведи могли поймать и ловушки, чтобы поймать. Остальные Gummie Медведи везде Веселый и никогда мирного царства сейчас находится в руках короля Кислая Candy. Вы Gummie носит их единственная надежда, чтобы спасти их Примите миссию и найти три камня магии и вернуть их к медали Gummie Медведи так магии может работать назад и Gummie медведей непослушные король и его армия свободно. Играть через 12 сахарных миров Выполните 13 миссий Классическое приключение платформу с Gummie Медведь оборудование Полный мир 3D

SE.name: Gummy Bears Magical Medallion
SE.description: The hidden Kingdom of the Gummy Bears is a tantalizing colourful world overflowing with mouth-watering sweets! For years King Sour Berry searched for a magical artefact called the Gummy Bear Medallion, which kept the Gummy Bears hidden from him. The king finally found it and removed the three mystical gems making the Gummy Bears visible. The kings Crazy Candy Army chased and captured them setting traps for those that avoided capture. The kingdom is now under the rule of King Sour berry. You are the Gummy Bears only hope to save them from a life of unhappiness. You must accept the quest to find the gems and return them to the Gummy Bears Medallion. Only then can the magic of the medallion hide the Gummy Bears once more from the evil King Sour Berry and his Crazy Candy Army. Play through 12 sugar coated worlds. 13 different achievements to unlock. Classic adventure platformer with a Gummy Bears twist. Full 3D environments and characters set with a 2D camera.
